channel.title: For anyone who wants to advertise!
channel.description: Ok, well if you are looking to advertise your website, then please tell me. I am willing to do a link exchange where I will put you on my sponsors list as long as you put a link on you website to mine... It is kinda like a partnering website... An add or just a link on say your homepage or forum, or any other part of your website is fine as long as it is visible. I will be putting you on my hompage under "sponsors". So please post ehre if you would like to do this. I am willing to do with more than 1 person.

item.title: For anyone who wants to advertise!
item.dc:creator: @Xion Xion
item.description:
@Xion wrote:

[quote=“xbverx, post:4, topic:212264”][quote author=Xion link=topic=279581.msg2274974#msg2274974 date=1213414440]

why when someone could just go to traffictub.com and spend a little cash for more traffic ?

Because this is free…
[/quote]
free for about max 100 uniques a month whereas you can get 5k+ unique hits for as little as about 12USD amirite?[/quote]

Ya so why don’t you do both? Its free for 100 uniques… FREE… so there is nothing wrong with that…

Read full topic
item.source: For anyone who wants to advertise!
